action.action-desc: Mr. Bacon introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to make certain spouses eligible for services under the disabled veterans’ outreach program, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Gold Star and Surviving Spouse Career Services Act.

section.header: Eligibility of spouses for services under the disabled veterans’ outreach program
section.text: Section 4103A of title 38, United States Code, is amended—

clause.text: in the matter preceding subparagraph (A), by inserting and eligible persons after eligible veterans; and
in subparagraph (C), by inserting , and eligible persons, after Other eligible veterans;

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (2), by inserting and eligible persons after veterans each place it appears; and

clause.text: by inserting or eligible person after veteran each place it appears; and
by inserting or eligible person’s after veteran’s;

subparagraph.text: by inserting and eligible persons after eligible veterans each place it appears; and

paragraph.text: by adding at the end the following new subsection:

subsection.text: In this section, the term eligible person means—

paragraph.text: any spouse described in section 4101(5) of this title; or
the spouse of any person who died while a member of the Armed Forces.
